alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:33AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Craven, central Carteret and south central Pamlico Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 432 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newport, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, South River, North River, Merrimon, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Janeiro, Wildwood, Great Neck, Open Grounds Farm, Nc Pamlico, North Harlowe, Merritt, Cherry Branch Ferry Terminal, Minnesott Beach Ferry, Mitchell Village, Crab Point Village and Minnesott Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
